name: shell-bell
effect: Held: Heals the holder by 1/8 of any damage it inflicts.
short_effect: Held: Holder receives 1/8 of the damage it deals when attacking.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that restores HP upon striking the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that restores HP upon striking the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. The holding POKéMON regains some HP upon striking the foe.
